text: Gerda Johanna Marie van der Kade-Koudijs (29 October 1923 - 19 March 2015) was a Dutch athlete who competed at the 1948 Summer Olympics. Olympisch kampioene Van der Kade-Koudijs overleden She won a gold medal in the 4×100 m relay. Two years earlier she won European titles in the 4×100 m relay and long jump and finished sixth in the individual 100 m race.Gerda van der Kade-Koudijs . sports-reference.com She was born in Rotterdam and died in Almelo. ==References== Category:1923 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Olympic gold medalists for the Netherlands Category:Dutch sprinters Category:Dutch long jumpers Category:Medalists at the 1948 Summer Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Rotterdam
title: Gerda van der Kade-Koudijs
